overview: Featuring songs from their debut album DANZIG: "Twist of Cain" and the controversial uncut versions of "Am I Demon", "She Rides" and "Mother". Plus interviews and behind-the-scenes footage. Highlights include: Glenn revealing his songwriting process, reading Wolverine comics, discussing his book collection, chugging a box of Milk Duds before an encore, and Eerie Von being a badass.
tagline: They are both the seekers and the sought-after. Now they are captured. Danzig on video: 40 minutes of uncensored pain and pleasure.
title: Danzig: Home Video
